trans-unit.source: Renders ink on a surface.
trans-unit.target: Coloca tinta em uma superfície.

trans-unit.source: Ink rendering occurs in two ways: dynamic and static.
trans-unit.target: Renderização de tinta ocorre de duas maneiras: dinâmico e estático.

trans-unit.source: Dynamic rendering occurs as ink is written to an inking surface: the stroke is rendered as it is being collected.
trans-unit.target: Renderização dinâmica ocorre como tinta é gravada em uma superfície de tinta: o traço é renderizado como ele está sendo coletado.

trans-unit.source: Static rendering occurs after stroke data is collected and attached to a new stroke.
trans-unit.target: Renderização estática ocorre depois que os dados de traço são coletados e anexados a um novo traço.

trans-unit.source: To render ink dynamically using the InkPresenter, attach the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.RootVisual%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the InkPresenter by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para renderizar tinta dinamicamente usando InkPresenter, anexe o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.RootVisual%2A>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>a InkPresenter usando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer.RootVisual%2A>

trans-unit.source: To statically render ink, add stroke objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para renderizar estaticamente tinta, adicionar objetos de traço para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Organiza o conteúdo de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> this element uses to arrange its child content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> esse elemento usa para organizar seu conteúdo filho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the arranged size of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> element and its child.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que representa o tamanho organizado <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"> </xref> elemento e seus filhos.

trans-unit.source: Attaches the visual of a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> to an <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anexa o visual de um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Attach the visual of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> to dynamically render ink on your control.
trans-unit.target: Anexar o visual de um <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>para renderizar dinamicamente tinta em seu controle.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The visual of a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O visual de um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"></xref> that specifies the appearance of the dynamically rendered ink.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes"> </xref> que especifica a aparência da tinta dinamicamente renderizada.

trans-unit.source: visual is already attached to a visual tree.
trans-unit.target: visualjá está anexado a uma árvore visual.

trans-unit.source: Detaches the visual of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desanexa o visual da <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes> on a custom control changes, the visual of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> must be re-attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>em um controle personalizado é alterado, o visual de que <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>devem ser anexados novamente ao <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes>

trans-unit.source: Call the DetachVisuals and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> methods to re-attach the visual to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>.
trans-unit.target: Chame os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A>métodos para anexar novamente o visual para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.AttachVisuals%2A> e DetachVisuals

trans-unit.source: The visual of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"></xref> to detach.
trans-unit.target: O visual da <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer"> </xref> desanexar.

trans-unit.source: visual is not attached to the .
trans-unit.target: visualnão está anexado ao .

trans-unit.source: Returns a clipping geometry that indicates the area that will be clipped if the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma geometria recorte que indica a área que será recortada se o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>

trans-unit.source: The available size of the element.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho disponível do elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> that represents the area that is clipped when <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> que representa a área é recortado quando <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the child element at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o filho elemento no local especificado index posição.

trans-unit.source: Index position of the child element.
trans-unit.target: Posição de índice do elemento filho.

trans-unit.source: The child element at the specified index position.
trans-unit.target: O elemento filho no local especificado index posição.

trans-unit.source: Measures the child element of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref> to prepare for arranging it during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: Mede o elemento filho de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"> </xref> para se preparar para a organização durante o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride*>aprovados.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: An upper limit <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that should not be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: Um limite superior <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> que não devem ser ultrapassados.

trans-unit.source: The target <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the element.
trans-unit.target: O destino <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkPresenterAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.InkPresenterAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the strokes that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"></xref> displays.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define os traços que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"> </xref> exibe.

trans-unit.target: Os traços que o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter"> </xref> exibe.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkPresenter.Strokes*>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that is equal to the number of visual child elements of this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que é igual ao número de elementos filho de visual desta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Decorator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos filho de visual.
